attributes.action: Fine Ash Manor Secondary School For Not Helping Students Who Are Being Bullied At School.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been bullied at this school for 5 years. Every incident I report has not been delt with. The school say they are strict on bullying and they are not doing anything about it. If Ash Manor is fined or taken to court then hopefully they will take bullying reports seriously in the future.
